headline: Show HN: Solana Workbench, your one stop shop for Solana development
description:
Hey HN! We are trying to improve the “glass chewing” developer experience of Solana, a new Ethereum alternative crypto. To that end, we’ve made an open source GUI app that runs on OSX and Windows. We want to improve observability and portability just like we did working in DevOps!

https://github.com/workbenchapp/solana-workbench
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Solana Workbench，您的Solana开发一站式商店
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Solana Workbench，您的Solana開發一站式商店
description_zh-Hans:
嘿，HN! 我们正在努力改善Solana（一种新的以太坊替代加密货币）的 "啃玻璃 "开发者体验。为此，我们做了一个开源的GUI应用，在OSX和Windows上运行。我们希望改善可观察性和可移植性，就像我们在DevOps工作一样！

https://github.com/workbenchapp/solana-workbench
description_zh-Hant:
嘿，HN! 我們正在努力改善Solana（一種新的以太坊替代加密貨幣）的 "啃玻璃 "開發者體驗。為此，我們做了一個開源的GUI應用，在OSX和Windows上運行。我們希望改善可觀察性和可移植性，就像我們在DevOps工作一樣！

https://github.com/workbenchapp/solana-workbench
